statements: SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT supplier_name AS name, contact_name AS contact FROM suppliers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE phone_number LIKE '123%';
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name FROM suppliers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY contact_name ASC, supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name FROM suppliers WHERE email LIKE '%@yahoo.com%' OR phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, quantity, price FROM suppliers INNER JOIN procurement ON suppliers.supplier_id = procurement.supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, quantity, price FROM suppliers INNER JOIN procurement ON suppliers.supplier_id = procurement.supplier_id WHERE price < 100;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;

SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(procurement_id) AS total_procurements FROM suppliers LEFT JOIN procurement ON suppliers.supplier_id = procurement.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING COUNT(procurement_id) > 2;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, quantity, price FROM suppliers JOIN procurement ON suppliers.supplier_id = procurement.supplier_id WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT SUM(price) AS total_cost FROM procurement WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_name FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id NOT IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM procurement);
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT name, email FROM suppliers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT address, city, state FROM addresses ORDER BY state;
SELECT id, name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM addresses WHERE zip_code LIKE '90%' ORDER BY zip_code DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM suppliers WHERE phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT suppliers.name, addresses.address, addresses.city, addresses.state FROM suppliers INNER JOIN addresses ON suppliers.id = addresses.supplier_id;
SELECT name, email, phone FROM suppliers WHERE id IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM addresses WHERE state = 'CA');
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email, supplier_phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, unit_price FROM suppliers INNER JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.supplier_id WHERE quantity_in_stock > 0 ORDER BY supplier_name, unit_price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT address_line1, city, state FROM addresses WHERE supplier_id = 2 ORDER BY state ASC;
SELECT contact_name, contact_phone_number FROM contacts WHERE supplier_id = 3 AND contact_email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, quantity_in_stock FROM products WHERE supplier_id = 4 AND unit_price > 50 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers INNER JOIN contacts ON suppliers.supplier_id = contacts.supplier_id WHERE contact_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM contacts WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM suppliers ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT id, name, email FROM suppliers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT p.name, p.price, s.name as supplier_name FROM products p INNER JOIN suppliers s ON p.supplier_id = s.id
SELECT o.id as order_id, o.order_date, o.total_amount, s.name as supplier_name FROM orders o INNER JOIN suppliers s ON o.supplier_id = s.id WHERE o.total_amount > 1000
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, s.email as supplier_email FROM contacts c INNER JOIN suppliers s ON c.supplier_id = s.id WHERE c.phone_number LIKE '%123%'
